description: This is a React component source file for the 'Home' page of a note management system. It manages the state and behavior for loading, displaying, searching, creating, editing, and deleting notes, utilizing imported components Sidebar, NotesGrid, and NoteEditor. It interacts with an API abstraction for backend operations.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React functional component for the home page, rendering the notes interface and managing interactions.

methods.name: openCreate
methods.description: Opens the note creation editor by resetting selection and toggling editor state.

methods.name: openEdit
methods.description: Opens the editor with a selected note for editing.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles saving a note, supporting both creation and update workflows with optimistic UI updates and error handling.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note and manages state updates, with error fallback.
